Package org.omg.dds.core.policy

Interface DurabilityService

All Superinterfaces:
DDSObject, QosPolicy, QosPolicy.ForDataWriter, QosPolicy.ForTopic, Serializable
public interface DurabilityService extends QosPolicy.ForTopic, QosPolicy.ForDataWriter
Specifies the configuration of the durability service. That is, the service that implements the Durability.Kind of Durability.Kind.TRANSIENT and Durability.Kind.PERSISTENT. Concerns: Topic, DataWriter RxO: No Changeable: No This policy is used to configure the History and the ResourceLimits used by the fictitious DataReader and DataWriter used by the "persistence service." The "persistence service" is the one responsible for implementing Durability.Kind.TRANSIENT and Durability.Kind.PERSISTENT.
See Also:
  • Durability
